mapper.sql: stunum, stuid, stuname, stusex, studate, ins, major, claid, stuadd, admdate, polsta
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_student where claid = #{claid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_student (stunum, stuid, stuname, stusex, studate, ins, major, claid, stuadd, admdate, polsta) values (#{stunum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stusex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{polsta,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_student
stunum,
stuid,
stuname,
stusex,
studate,
ins,
major,
claid,
stuadd,
admdate,
polsta,

mapper.update:
update tb_student
stuname = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stusex = #{stusex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
studate = #{studate,jdbcType=DATE},
ins = #{ins,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
claid = #{claid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuadd = #{stuadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admdate = #{admdate,jdbcType=DATE},
polsta = #{polsta,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where stuid = #{stuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_student set stuname = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stusex = #{stusex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studate = #{studate,jdbcType=DATE}, ins = #{ins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, claid = #{claid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuadd = #{stuadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admdate = #{admdate,jdbcType=DATE}, polsta = #{polsta,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where stunum = #{stunum,jdbcType=INTEGER} and stuid = #{stuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
